description: Mary at left, wearing voluminous draperies, holding baby Jesus, with her PR elbow on a cushion; Joseph seated behind a rock (?), resting his head on his PL hand and holding a book in his PR hand; sketchy
medium: Pen and brown ink on laid paper
provenance: Sale, Christie's, New York, January 15, 1992, no. 22, as Circle of Guido Reni, for $900, to Mia Weiner, for Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1992-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Rest on the Flight into Egypt
